text: @GovWhitmer @GovPritzker @GovMikeDeWine @GovEvers @GovTimWalz @GovHolcomb @GovAndyBeshear and then ohio comes out and says they are re-opening on May 1st and basically "we have to live with the dangers of covid-19 until there's a vaccine" ... so much for a bipartisan, data-driven approach
